Response - Class in main.response
Carries a Message and a ModeInfo.
Message carries information about the last command execution.
ModeInfo carries information about the current state the program is in.
Response(Message, ModeInfo) - Constructor for class main.response.Response
The constructor for the Response class.
Result - Interface in manager.result
The result returned from the manager to the command after an operation.
The result is used by the command to update the StateManager on the result of the command execution.
Result.Type - Enum in manager.result
 
retrieveStoredCommand() - Method in class manager.StateManager
 
retrieveUndoSnapshot() - Method in interface data.ITaskDataUndo
Retrieves the undo snapshot holding the previous state of all tasks that were changed in the last action.
The undo snapshot is cleared (deleted) when this method is called.
